page.title: 10CLUBS IN BISHOPS LYDEARD
page.content: The Little Club-meets monthly to join together those interested in music and drama. Football Club-has its own pitch and pavilion,enters a number of weekend football leagues. Men's Club-caters mainly for snooker playing. Over 60's Club-meets monthly and caters for the interests of the senior members of the village. Tug-of-War Club-participates in district and county competitions. Wives Group-meets monthly with a wide range of activities and interests for this particular section of the village. The Women's Institute-meets monthly and lives up to the high standard established throughout the country. Continued on Page 9.
